article.title: Company_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: wiktionarycompanyAcompanyis a group of more than one persons to carry out an enterprise and so a form of business organization.

list.listitem: Company (military unit), a group of typically 75200 soldiers
Opera company, an instituted company that performs operas
Theatre company, of touring actors, singers and/or dancers
Company (film)''Company'' (film), a 2002 Hindi film directed by Ram Gopal Varma
Company (free improvisation group), a jazz collective founded in 1968
Company (Heroes), a fictional covert international organization in the NBC dramaHeroes
Company (LGBT magazine)''Company'' (LGBT magazine), the only existing LGBT print magazine in Hungary, published monthly
Company (magazine)''Company'' (magazine), a monthly fashion, celebrity and lifestyle magazine published in the United Kingdom
Company (musical)''Company'' (musical), music and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim and book by George Furth
Company (novel)''Company'' (novel), a 2006 book by Max Barry
Company (song), the title song from the Broadway musical,Company
Company (short story)"Company" (short story), by Samuel Beckett
Company, the subtitle ofString Quartet No. 2 (Glass)String Quartet No. 2by composer Philip Glass
